DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the feasibility of using indirect calorimetry (IC) within a comprehensive weight reduction program. Will individuals that receive a personalized nutrition program, at baseline, from IC technology respond better to treatment compared to individuals receiving IC technology at three months.
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility of Integrating Indirect Calorimetry (IC) Technology in Primary Care
DOC.criteria: BMI greater than 30 kg/m2 1870 years of age No participation in other weight loss efforts outside study. Pregnant or lactating
